title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: GPS-Based Discovery Learning Pedagogy Design for Elementary Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of elementary social studies curriculum and basic teaching methodologies, along with fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Design at least three social studies lessons that enhance learners' critical thinking through GPS-based spatial inquiry activities
Develop at least two types of discovery learning-based GPS lesson materials executable in mobile environments
Derive at least three improvement points for GPS instructional design based on formative assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
